1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"Umm Habibah hint Jahsh sought a verdict from Allah's Messenger. She said 'I suffer from persistent bleeding such that I do not become pere. Shall I give up the Salat?' He said: 'No, that is only a blood vessel. So perform Ghusl then pray.' So she would perform Ghusl for each prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمُسْتَحَاضَةِ أَنَّهَا تَغْتَسِلُ عِنْدَ كُلِّ صَلاَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Mustahadah That She Is To Perform Ghusl For Every Salat
